description.displayText:
I had some interaction with Melanie on the Care.com app and wanted to interview her in person. When I tried to set something up, this is the response I received. By the way, this interaction occurred on 4-6-2022. 
Hello. I'm not sure what the reason for the unwillingness to have a phone conversation is, especially during a global pandemic, but I'm going to move on elsewhere. Best of luck filling this position. Thank you for your time.
description.originalText:
I had some interaction with Melanie on the Care.com app and wanted to interview her in person. When I tried to set something up, this is the response I received. By the way, this interaction occurred on 4-6-2022. 
Hello. I'm not sure what the reason for the unwillingness to have a phone conversation is, especially during a global pandemic, but I'm going to move on elsewhere. Best of luck filling this position. Thank you for your time.
